mainEntity.name: How to download rotated PDF file?

acceptedAnswer.text:
You can download the PDF file in one of the following ways:
1- Download the PDF file on your device
2- Send the PDF to your Google Drive account
3- Send the PDF file to your Dropbox account.
4- Easily email the rotated PDF file to yourself and your friends
